text: Lamine Ndiaye (born 19 June 1995) is a French footballer who currently plays for CFA club GSI Pontivy as a defender. ==Club career== ===MFK Košice=== Ndiaye started his career at Lorient but fail to make through first team and was released in June 2014. He made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for Košice on 19 May 2015 against ŽP Šport Podbrezová.MFK KOŠICE 5:0 ŽP ŠPORT PODBREZOVÁ 19.05.2015, futbalnet.sk He came back to France during 2016 summer mercato and sign with GSI Pontivy. ==References== ==External links== * MFK Košice profile * * Futbalnet profile * Eurofotbal profile Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:French expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Lorient players Category:FC VSS Košice players Category:GSI Pontivy players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:2. title: Lamine Ndiaye (French footballer)
